about_the_game:
Prepare for the end of the world with the official Earthfall soundtrack, composed by Adam Gubman!

Track List:

Game Mixes - Composed by Adam Gubman / Mixed by Keith Sjoquist

  • Earthfall Main Theme
  • Ready Up
  • The Drone Mob
  • Breakdown
  • Supply Run
  • Data Recovery Holdout
  • Data Recovery
  • Radio Silence
  • Radio Silence Escape
  • The Thresher
  • The Beast
  • The Whiplash
  • Sapper Spawns
  • Sapper Explodes
